description: Students expand their skills by continuing to listen, speak, read, and write on such topics as the concept of time, leisure activities, and culinary traditions in North American and Hispanic cultures and to work in the Language Lab. Prerequisite: Spanish 111 or placement. Offered Fall and Spring Semesters.
name: Beginning Spanish II
prerequisites: Spanish 111 or placement. Offered Fall and Spring Semesters.
